product_summary: Swifto is a cloud-based supply chain management (SCM) software that helps businesses automate and optimize their supply chain processes. With Swifto, businesses can gain visibility into their supply chain, improve collaboration with suppliers, and make better decisions to reduce costs and improve efficiency.
product_pros: Cloud-based, so it's accessible from anywhere
product_cons: Can be complex to set up
Some features are only available in the paid version
Not as customizable as some other SCM software
Not as many integrations as some other SCM software

product_usecases.details: Swifto can help businesses track their inventory levels in real time, so they can avoid stockouts and overstocking. The software also provides tools for forecasting demand, optimizing inventory levels, and managing inventory costs.

Swifto can help businesses manage their warehouses more efficiently. The software provides tools for tracking inventory, managing warehouse operations, and optimizing warehouse space. Swifto can also help businesses automate the picking and packing process.

Swifto can help businesses manage their transportation operations more efficiently. The software provides tools for planning and scheduling shipments, tracking shipments in real time, and managing freight costs. Swifto can also help businesses find the best shipping rates.

Swifto can help businesses manage their procurement processes more efficiently. The software provides tools for finding and comparing suppliers, negotiating contracts, and managing purchase orders. Swifto can also help businesses automate the procurement process.

Swifto can help businesses collaborate with their suppliers more effectively. The software provides tools for sharing information, managing contracts, and tracking shipments. Swifto can also help businesses resolve disputes and build stronger relationships with their suppliers.

product_pricing: Swifto offers a variety of pricing plans to meet the needs of businesses of all sizes. The Starter plan starts at $99 per month and includes basic features such as inventory management, warehouse management, and transportation management. The Professional plan starts at $199 per month and includes all of the features in the Starter plan, plus advanced features such as demand forecasting, inventory optimization, and warehouse optimization. The Enterprise plan starts at $299 per month and includes all of the features in the Professional plan, plus additional features such as multi-warehouse management, advanced reporting, and analytics.
